hero.title: Archaeological Information System of the Czech Republic
hero.subtitle: Comprehensive platform for managing, archiving and sharing archaeological data in the Czech Republic
features.feature1.title: Centralized Database
features.feature1.description: Access to an extensive database of archaeological finds, sites and research from across the Czech Republic.
features.feature2.title: Modern Tools
features.feature2.description: Use advanced mapping and analytical tools to work with archaeological data.
features.highlight: Reliable partner for archaeologists and researchers

tools.label: Tools
tools.title: AMCR Maps - Mapping Tools
tools.tool1.title: Site Search
tools.tool1.description: Interactive map interface for searching archaeological sites by various criteria including period, find type and geographic location.
tools.tool2.title: Spatial Analysis
tools.tool2.description: Advanced tools for spatial analysis of archaeological data, including heatmaps and statistical visualizations.
tools.tool3.title: Data Layering
tools.tool3.description: Ability to combine different data layers for a comprehensive view of archaeological finds in context.
tools.tool4.title: Data Export
tools.tool4.description: Flexible options for exporting maps and data to various formats for further processing.
tools.tool5.title: Timeline
tools.tool5.description: Visualization of archaeological finds over time with the ability to animate settlement development.
tools.tool6.title: Sharing and Collaboration
tools.tool6.description: Share your maps and analyses with colleagues and the public via public links.
tools.tool7.title: Mobile Access
tools.tool7.description: Fully responsive interface allows you to work with maps on mobile devices directly in the field.
additionalServices.title: Other Components of AIS CR
additionalServices.description: Discover the complete range of services and tools of the Archaeological Information System of the Czech Republic.
news.title: News
news.subtitle: Latest news from the archaeological world
news.news1.title: Launch of new AMCR maps version
news.news1.excerpt: Introducing an improved map interface with new features for analyzing archaeological data.
news.news2.title: Digital archive expansion
news.news2.excerpt: More than 10,000 new records from recent research have been added to the digital archive.

news.news3.excerpt: Invitation to the annual conference dedicated to the digitization of archaeological heritage.

news.news5.title: International cooperation
news.news5.excerpt: AIS CR is establishing cooperation with similar systems within Europe.

amcrPas.hero.title: AMCR-PAS
amcrPas.hero.subtitle: Portal for Amateur Collaborators and Detectorists
amcrPas.hero.intro: Application for recording and managing archaeological finds:
amcrPas.about.label: About the project
amcrPas.about.title: What is AMCR-PAS?
amcrPas.about.description: AMCR-PAS (Portal for Amateur Collaborators) is a specialized application for metal detectorists and other amateur archaeology enthusiasts. It enables simple and quick reporting of archaeological finds, their documentation and communication with professional institutions. The system helps protect archaeological heritage while supporting constructive collaboration between amateurs and professional archaeologists.
amcrPas.usefulInfo.title: Useful Information
amcrPas.usefulInfo.item1.title: Getting Started
amcrPas.usefulInfo.item1.description: Registration in the system is simple and quick. After approval, you'll gain access to find reporting and communication with archaeological institutions.
amcrPas.usefulInfo.item2.title: Find Documentation
amcrPas.usefulInfo.item2.description: Learn how to properly document finds - photography, GPS location, context description and other important information.
amcrPas.usefulInfo.item3.title: Legal Framework
amcrPas.usefulInfo.item3.description: Familiarize yourself with the legal obligations of detectorists, conditions for using metal detectors and rules for reporting archaeological finds.
amcrPas.usefulInfo.item4.title: Institutional Cooperation
amcrPas.usefulInfo.item4.description: How to effectively collaborate with museums, archaeological institutes and other professional institutions in protecting archaeological heritage.
amcrPas.blog.title: Articles and News
amcrPas.blog.subtitle: Latest information, guides and stories from amateur archaeology
amcrPas.blog.post1.title: How to Properly Document a Find
amcrPas.blog.post1.excerpt: Complete guide to documenting archaeological finds including photography and GPS recording.
amcrPas.blog.post2.title: Significant Find in Hradec Králové
amcrPas.blog.post2.excerpt: Story of an amateur detectorist who discovered rare medieval jewelry.
amcrPas.blog.post3.title: New Features in AMCR-PAS
amcrPas.blog.post3.excerpt: Introducing application improvements for even easier find reporting.
amcrPas.blog.post4.title: Detectorists Meetup 2024
amcrPas.blog.post4.excerpt: Invitation to the annual meeting of detectorists and archaeologists.
amcrPas.blog.post5.title: Winter Detecting
amcrPas.blog.post5.excerpt: Tips and tricks for effective metal detecting during winter months.
